name: Space Ball (itch) (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
Space Ball is a sidescroller platformer in 3D where your only source of movement is a jump. Jump onto platforms and bounce pads with the right timing while avoiding walls and pits to make it to the end.

Controls

Spacebar or Left Click to jump

Escape key to pause the game(once paused, press escape again to resume)

Instructions

To beat a level you must complete it in one try. If you die you get sent to the beginning of the level. If you hit a wall or fall into a pit you die and get reset. When you see a green bounce pad you must press jump at the same time you hit it in order to get a jump boost. At the end of a level you must jump into the big planet to beat the level.
